name.description: The name of the model in the format 'provider/model-name' (e.g., 'groq/llama-3.3-70b-versatile', 'openai/gpt-3.5-turbo')

response_schema.description: The schema of the response from the model. This is a JSON schema string. Presence indicates that model will return a structured response. DeusMachina will only support strict json response if this parameter is present.

fallback_models.description: The models to use as fallbacks. If the model fails, the fallback models will be used in order.
